alpha_discovery_workflow.description: Systematic protocol for discovering and validating trading edges

phase_1_hypothesis_generation.step_1: Literature review (execute parallel searches across all tier-0/1/2 sources)
phase_1_hypothesis_generation.step_2: Institutional reverse engineering (analyze 13F, patents, academic papers from RenTech, Two Sigma, etc.)
phase_1_hypothesis_generation.step_3: Mathematical brainstorming (apply stochastic calculus, information theory, signal processing to bitcoin)
phase_1_hypothesis_generation.output: Ranked list of hypotheses with institutional evidence scores

phase_2_mathematical_formalization.step_1: Express hypothesis in LaTeX mathematical notation
phase_2_mathematical_formalization.step_2: Derive closed-form solution (if possible) or numerical approximation
phase_2_mathematical_formalization.step_3: Identify required data inputs and transformations

phase_3_implementation.step_2: Vectorize for speed (use Numba, Cython if needed)
phase_3_implementation.output: Production-grade Python module ready for Hostinger deployment

phase_4_validation.step_1: Backtest on historical bitcoin data (full history)
phase_4_validation.output: Validated strategy with Sharpe ratio, max drawdown, win rate

gate_1_institutional_validation.requirement: At least 1 tier-1 fund uses similar technique OR cited 500+ times
gate_1_institutional_validation.action_if_fail: Deprioritize or return to hypothesis generation

risk_management_framework.description: Professional-grade risk controls for billion-dollar hedge fund operations

portfolio_level.var_95: Value at Risk (95% confidence) <= 5% of portfolio per day

strategy_level.stop_loss: Dynamic stops based on ATR (Average True Range)
strategy_level.profit_targets: Take profits at 2x risk (1:2 risk-reward minimum)

execution_level.order_types: Prefer limit orders over market orders

monitoring.system_health: Server uptime, API connectivity, data freshness

research_execution_protocol.description: How to use this config with Claude Code Pro (200k context)

step_1_load_config.action: Claude Code reads this entire research_config.json at session start

step_2_parallel_research.action: Launch parallel WebSearch/WebFetch queries across all tiers
example_queries: Search tier-0 academic sources (arXiv, SSRN, NBER) for stochastic calculus bitcoin
Search tier-1 institutional (RenTech patents, AQR papers) for hidden markov models
Search tier-2 systematic managers (Man AHL, Bridgewater) for trend following
Search tier-3 academic (MIT, Princeton, Chicago) for market microstructure
Search tier-4 regulatory (SEC 13F, USPTO) for algorithmic trading patents
Search tier-5 implementation (QuantLib, GitHub) for Kalman filter bitcoin

step_3_synthesis.action: Analyze all search results, extract formulas, rank by validation score
step_3_synthesis.output_format: JSON array of alpha strategies with LaTeX formulas, Python implementations, evidence citations

step_4_export_to_hostinger.action: Generate Python modules ready for deployment
step_4_export_to_hostinger.format: Modular code (data ingestion, signal generation, execution, risk management)
step_4_export_to_hostinger.testing: Include unit tests and backtesting harness

optimization_tips.use_200k_context: Load entire research history in one session (all papers, formulas, implementations)
optimization_tips.batch_queries: Run 10-20 searches in parallel, aggregate results
optimization_tips.structured_output: Always output JSON for easy parsing and deployment
optimization_tips.version_control: Track research sessions, save outputs to .claude/research_outputs/

output_schema.description: Standardized JSON format for discovered alpha strategies

institutional_evidence.tier_1_funds: array of fund names using technique

renaissance_technologies_playbook.description: Reverse-engineered strategies from Renaissance Technologies Medallion Fund

core_principles.signal_diversification: Combine 1000+ uncorrelated micro-signals, each with tiny edge (51% vs 49%)
core_principles.high_frequency_execution: Hold periods: seconds to days, NOT months
core_principles.statistical_arbitrage: Exploit mean reversion in pricing inefficiencies
core_principles.massive_data_collection: Every tick, every instrument, every market, going back decades
core_principles.pure_mathematics: No fundamental analysis, no macro views - only math and statistics
core_principles.leverage: Modest leverage (2-3x) on highly diversified portfolio = low risk

applications: Volatility regime switching (low vol -> high vol transition)
hidden_markov_models.institutional_evidence: RenTech patent US7222080B2 (statistical arbitrage using state detection)

kernel_methods.description: Nonlinear pattern recognition in high-dimensional space
applications: Support Vector Machines for direction classification
Gaussian Process regression for volatility forecasting
Kernel ridge regression for nonlinear price prediction
kernel_methods.math_foundation: Reproducing Kernel Hilbert Spaces (RKHS), Mercer's theorem
kernel_methods.institutional_evidence: RenTech hired top machine learning researchers (Yann LeCun consulted)

signal_processing_wavelets.description: Multi-scale decomposition to separate noise from signal
applications: Wavelet decomposition (separate trend/cycle/noise in bitcoin prices)
signal_processing_wavelets.math_foundation: Discrete Wavelet Transform (DWT), Continuous Wavelet Transform (CWT)
signal_processing_wavelets.institutional_evidence: James Simons background in signal processing at IDA (code-breaking)

cointegration_pairs_trading.description: Exploit mean-reverting relationships between correlated assets
applications: Cross-exchange arbitrage (Binance BTC vs Coinbase BTC)
cointegration_pairs_trading.math_foundation: Engle-Granger test, Johansen test, Vector Error Correction Model (VECM)
cointegration_pairs_trading.institutional_evidence: RenTech core strategy is stat arb (pairs trading at scale)

natural_language_processing.description: Extract trading signals from news, social media, filings
search_queries: renaissance technologies natural language processing patents
natural_language_processing.math_foundation: TF-IDF, word embeddings (Word2Vec, GloVe), Transformers (BERT, GPT)
natural_language_processing.institutional_evidence: RenTech heavily invested in NLP research, hired computational linguists

applications: Order imbalance reversion (large buy -> short-term overreaction -> revert)
Intraday momentum reversal (morning pump -> afternoon dump)
Overnight gap reversion (gap up/down -> close the gap)
search_queries: "short term mean reversion" bitcoin high frequency
renaissance technologies high frequency mean reversion
short_term_mean_reversion.math_foundation: OU process (Ornstein-Uhlenbeck), half-life estimation, z-score normalization
short_term_mean_reversion.institutional_evidence: Medallion Fund holds positions for ~1-2 days on average (short-term focus)

order_flow_toxicity.description: Detect informed trading (whales) and trade with/against them
applications: Order flow imbalance (aggressive buys vs sells)
order_flow_toxicity.math_foundation: VPIN formula, Kyle's lambda (price impact), trade classification (Lee-Ready)
order_flow_toxicity.institutional_evidence: RenTech focuses on microstructure, likely uses order flow signals

machine_learning_ensembles.description: Combine hundreds of weak learners for robust predictions
applications: Random Forest (1000+ trees for direction classification)
Gradient Boosting (XGBoost, LightGBM for price prediction)
machine_learning_ensembles.math_foundation: Bootstrap aggregating, boosting theory, bias-variance tradeoff
machine_learning_ensembles.institutional_evidence: RenTech employs 90+ PhDs in ML/AI/Stats (heavy ML usage)

volatility_forecasting.description: Predict future volatility for risk management and options trading
applications: GARCH models (EGARCH, GJR-GARCH for bitcoin vol)
HAR model (Heterogeneous AutoRegressive) for multi-scale vol
volatility_forecasting.institutional_evidence: Vol forecasting crucial for position sizing and risk management

kalman_filtering.description: Optimal state estimation from noisy observations
applications: Estimate true price from noisy tick data
kalman_filtering.institutional_evidence: Standard tool in quantitative finance, likely used by RenTech

how_to_use: Step 1: Copy one of the 'parallel_queries' arrays
Step 2: In Claude Code, request: 'Execute these searches in parallel and synthesize results'
Step 3: Claude Code will use WebSearch tool to fetch all results concurrently
Step 4: Claude Code will analyze, extract formulas, and output structured JSON
Step 5: Save JSON output to .claude/research_outputs/ for deployment to Hostinger
execution_instructions.expected_output: JSON file with 10-50 alpha strategies, each with LaTeX formula, Python code, validation scores
execution_instructions.context_usage: ~150k tokens (fits in Claude Code Pro 200k limit)
